title: LAIR / Door to Stairwell
description: This prevents the player from leaving the main lair -- only fires if they have dealt with Ruby but not read her journal.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant clears his throat. "..."
dialogueTree.english: The lieutenant clears his throat. "Detective -- aren't you forgetting something?"
dialogueTree.polish: Porucznik odchrząkuje. „Detektywie – nie zapominasz o czymś?”
dialogueTree.belarusian: Лейтэнант адкашліваецца. „Дэтэктыў – вы нешта не забываеце?”

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We still have to deal with her..."..."
links.english: "We still have to deal with her..." He adjusts his coat. "Not pleasant, I know. But we can't leave her like that. And we have to investigate the scene, too."
links.polish: „Wciąż musimy zająć się jej ciałem...” – stwierdza i poprawia swoją kurtkę. „To nieprzyjemne, wiem. Ale nie możemy tak jej tam zostawić. Trzeba też przeszukać to miejsce”.
links.belarusian: «Мы ўсё яшчэ павінны заняцца яе целам...» — зазначае ён, папраўляючы сваю куртку. «Гэта непрыемна, ведаю. Але мы не можам так пакінуць яе там. Трэба таксама праверыць гэтае месца».

links.title: You: ""But it's so sad, Kim. Too sad for..."
links.english: "But it's so sad, Kim. Too sad for me!"
links.polish: „Ale to takie smutne, Kim. Zbyt smutne dla mnie!”
links.belarusian: «Але гэта так сумна, Кім. Занадта сумна для мяне!»

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Be that as it may, it doesn't chan..."
links.english: "Be that as it may, it doesn't change the fact. We have a duty to her. Let's see it through." He gestures back toward the tunnels. "After you."
links.polish: „Możliwe, ale niczego to nie zmienia. Mamy wobec niej obowiązek do wypełnienia. Zajmijmy się tym” – mówi, po czym wskazuje gestem tunele: „Prowadź”.
links.belarusian: «Магчыма, але гэта нічога не змяняе. Мы маем перад ёй абавязак, які трэба выканаць. Давайце зоймемся гэтым», — кажа ён, пасля чаго паказвае жестам на тунэлі: «Вядзі».

links.title: You: ""I'd rather go outside and have a b..."
links.english: "I'd rather go outside and have a beer right now."
links.polish: „Wolałbym raczej wyjść na zewnątrz i strzelić sobie piwo”.
links.belarusian: «Я б хутчэй выйшаў на вуліцу і выпіў піва».

links.title: You: ""Yeah, you're right. Let's get it o..."
links.english: "Yeah, you're right. Let's get it over with."
links.polish: „Tak. Masz rację. Miejmy to już za sobą”.
links.belarusian: «Так. Ты маеш рацыю. Няхай гэта будзе ўжо за намі».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He gestures back toward the tunnels..."
links.english: He gestures back toward the tunnels. "After you."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Her journal? We should probably le..."
links.english: "Her journal? We should probably leaf through it. Might learn something useful."
links.polish: „Jej dziennik? Powinniśmy go przynajmniej przekartkować. Może dowiemy się z niego czegoś przydatnego”.
links.belarusian: «Яе дзённік? Мы павінны хаця б яго прагартаць. Магчыма, даведаемся з яго чагосьці карыснага».

links.title: You: ""Of course. I was just testing you,..."
links.english: "Of course. I was just testing you, to see if *you* remembered."
links.belarusian: «Вядома. Я толькі правяраў цябе, ці *ты* запомніў».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant only shakes his head..."
links.english: The lieutenant only shakes his head. "Let's just do it, shall we?"
links.polish: Porucznik kręci głową. „Bierzmy się za to, dobrze?”
links.belarusian: Лейтэнант ківае галавой. „Бярэмся за гэта, добра?”

links.title: You: ""Aw, can't you do it Kim? I'm wiped..."
links.english: "Aw, can't you do it Kim? I'm wiped out."
links.polish: „Ojej, Kim, nie możesz ty tego zrobić? Jestem wykończony”.
links.belarusian: «Ой, Кім, ты не можаш гэтага зрабіць? Я зусім выматаны».

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We still need to investigate the s..."
links.english: "We still need to investigate the scene. Remember?"
